description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB SQL databases.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database create
commands.summary: Create an SQL database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database delete
commands.summary: Delete the SQL database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database exists
commands.summary: Checks if an Azure Cosmos DB SQL database exists.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database list
commands.summary: List the SQL databases under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
examples: az cosmosdb sql database list --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database merge
commands.summary: Merge the partitions of a sql database.
examples: az cosmosdb sql database merge -g my-resource-group -a my-account --name my-database

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database restore
commands.summary: Restore a deleted sql database within the same account.
examples: az cosmosdb sql database restore --resource-group resource_group --account-name database_account_name --name name_of_database_needs_to_be_restored --restore-timestamp 2020-07-13T16:03:41+0000

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database restore
commands.summary: Restore a deleted sql database within the same account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql database restore --account-name
                                 --name
                                 --resource-group
                                 [--disable-ttl {false, true}]
                                 [--restore-timestamp]
examples: az cosmosdb sql database restore --resource-group resource_group --account-name database_account_name --name name_of_database_needs_to_be_restored --restore-timestamp 2020-07-13T16:03:41+0000

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql database show
commands.summary: Show the details of a SQL database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
